name: CORAL (Hexablu)
description:
CORAL is a bullet-hell where you are a wisp. you can only move on a diagonal axis, and you are constantly in motion. and your goal is to reach as many rifts as you can before you meet your spiny demise. even though the gameplay may seem quite simple, I find it pretty addicting! it's a lot harder than it looks!

Control using the arrow keys! Press space to start! press esc to toggle Fullscreen! 

CORAL is actually a spiritual successor to an old scratch game i made in 2016. ever since i made the game i was always fond of the concept, so i decided to go back and totally remaster the game using my newfound knowledge of GML in game maker studio 2.  

Why the name "Coral?" Coral is actually the 2019 Pantone Color Of The Year and i've always liked that color so i decided that the next game that i would make i would use it as the color scheme.

I'd also like to give a big thanks to my friend Freddu for making the spooky chiptune music for the game.

The font used is "Textmachine Handwriting" by Polyducks

Thanks for taking the time for checking out the game!
